message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. Take this generous offer and we can both move on.
Alice, let's be fair. 50/50 split, but I'm feeling generous.  Take a little less and we can end this now before inflation eats into things.
Bob, time is money! I'm offering you a fair deal - take it before inflation eats away at your share even more.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  Accept this offer, and we both walk away with something substantial. Don't be greedy, inflation is hurting us both.
